scripts.sfci:init:ci: sfdx ci:org:create -a ${npm_config_alias} && sfdx ci:org:printurl && sfdx ci:package:install && sfdx ci:source:push --ci && sfdx ci:user:assign:permsetgroup && sfdx ci:user:assign:profile
scripts.sfci:init: sfdx ci:org:create -a ${npm_config_alias} && sfdx ci:org:printurl && sfdx ci:package:install && npm run sfci:init:postcreate && npm run data:import --target=${npm_config_alias}
scripts.sfci:init:win: sfdx ci:org:create -a %npm_config_alias% && sfdx ci:package:install && npm run sfci:init:postcreate && npm run data:import --target=%npm_config_alias%
scripts.sfci:init:postcreate: sfdx ci:source:push && sfdx ci:user:assign:permsetgroup && sfdx ci:user:assign:profile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:lwc && npm run lint:aura
